description:
Ami is a cocky blond who welcomes any challenge because she thinks quite simply that she will win. Cyd starts slow allowing Ami to relax and feel like she is still in control even as the power to move, stand up or even raise her head is taken away. She likes to squirm so Cyd uses this to his advantage as he tickles her with the pin wheel, pours hot wax all over her body and makes her cum uncontrollably with a vibrator. Ami screams through her gag so loud the audio peaks, her face contorted and blatantly exposing her pleasure and pain.
In the final scene, the slow steady immeasurable burn of the hot sauce teaches Ami to chose her challenges wisely.
title: Overwhelming Ami Emerson
